title: Very interesting application

author: Anish Shah
comment: What a sexy app
title: What a sexy app

author: JAYESH PATEL
comment: Just read about the app and m going nuts over the possibilities. Sure its a WIP and already looks awesome, but as a fellow social media designer, I know it will be all over the news. Way to go and all the very best mate.

reply.author: White Monkey Labs
reply.content: Thanks so much dude :) feel free to email me us to talk more about the possibilities 😉👍

title: Dude you are a genius! ;)

author: Matt Waring
comment: Interesting, and I suspect will be useful when travelling to get upto date feedback on places to visit, eat, drink, etc. Not sure how this app is using Maps (Google I guess) - it should show places of interest nearby, it doesn't. When searching for a local bar, the map zooms out and shows me the whole world!? (data hungry) Surely search starts local first, if I'm in London but looking for a bar in New York I'll add NY into the search bar? Or maybe I'm doing something wrong ;) Anyway this app has potential.

reply.author: White Monkey Labs
reply.content: Hey Matt, thanks for the feedback! I agree the search is a bit broken right now, because Google Places Search seems to search everywhere rather than around you (or maybe I am actually doing something wrong :p). I'll definitely try and get this fixed in the next update :)

title: It's a work in progress

author: Robert Ferguson
comment: Sure to be a must have on all devices. Remember to add the name of the venue your adding the kite for. Otherwise we will see your kite but wont know what its for.

reply.author: White Monkey Labs
reply.content: Thanks Robert. You are actually able to edit the location text to include the name there as well. but we are very aware of this problem and working on an elegant solution. thanks for the kind words 😊

title: Extremely polished, and well designed

author: N. Luna
comment: Ha! I think that's a great name "KITES" ...I heard this term from ppl I've known & went to jail ★ messages or notes being called "kites"

reply.author: White Monkey Labs
reply.content: ha thanks! the name comes from how I imagine these messages would be left around in real life - as kites so you can see them from near and far :)

title: Partial download, just to say.....

comment: Wow! Fantastic new concept. Have you thought of date and time bound messages?

comment: Waiting for it to become popular in my country (Brazil)
title: Looks really cool and well made

author: Alden Darbouze
comment: The phone confirmation doesn't work as I suspect it should. It tells you to try again.  When you change your password, it doesn't ask you for your old password. That's like, the standard for passwords.  I made another account using the same email address. It doesn't tell you you can't, so I'm guessing its intentional. Also, there was no confirmation after making either account.  Setting a picture then trying to set another results in me seeing the same original picture.   Overall though, it's decent.

reply.author: White Monkey Labs
reply.content: These have all now been implemented / fixed. Thanks for the feedback!

title: Some hiccups:

author: Caleb Haney
comment: This app has changed my life. I was driving and the app crashed. 5 stars for realistic crash physics.
title: Good

author: Mark Buckman
comment: Google Maps and Google Hangouts does everything this app does and more, no need to search for friends!  Buggy.

reply.author: White Monkey Labs
reply.content: It's not marketed as a Maps or Hangouts killer. Please expand on buggy so we can work to fix any issues you may be having.
